summary: Provides utilities to generate JSON descriptor files that expose Conan package information (name, version, directories, components) to the Qbs build system, creating one or more module definitions per package as needed.
business_intent: Facilitates seamless integration of Conan-managed dependencies into Qbs projects by automatically producing the files required by Qbs's conan module provider, enabling Qbs to locate and link against Conan packages and their components.
